item.title: React.js Games
item.description: React.js Games Â¶ Recently I was at a hackathon (StartHack 22) and there I did a lot of frontend for the app we produced. I told myself there I’ll not write another line of Javascript or CSS for the weeks to come, because I had enough frontend for the time being. Then came the weekend and some people were playing Minesweeper on my Discord bot Lecturfier. The problem with Minesweeper on Discord is though, that the playing field is simply one big field of spoiler-tagged characters, meaning there is no way to actually flag bombs and there’s no way for the bot to know if you won or lost.
